channel.title: Douglas County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Douglas County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: OR-230 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-230 west. Distance to Prospect, Crater Lake (via OR-62 North) and Medford (via OR-62 South).

item.title: OR-230 West - Douglas County
item.description: OR-230 west in Douglas County. Taken just west of Diamond Lake.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 170
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 170 - OR-99/Cottage Grove. At the sign at the interchange, this is labeled Business OR-99. Signs through the town of Cottage Grove, do not include the word Business.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 163
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 163 - Curtin/Lorane.

item.title: OR-38 East/OR-99 North at I-5
item.description: OR-38 East/OR-99 North at I-5. Use I-5 South to Roseburg; I-5 north to Cottage Grove and Portland. This is the eastern end of OR-38. This segment of OR-99 ends here, and re-appears in Cottage Grove.

item.title: OR-38 East/OR-99 North at Curtin Road Jct.
item.description: OR-38 East/OR-99 North at Curtin Road Jct north to Anlauf and Lorane. Continue east on OR-38/OR-99 for Cottage Grove and I-5. The OR-38 shield is not displayed on this sign post, only OR-99.

item.title: OR-38 East at OR-99
item.description: OR-38 east at OR-99 (not signed) in Drain. Turn right for OR-99 south to Yoncalla and Roseburg. Continue straight on OR-38 East/OR-99 North to Eugene. This stretch of OR-99 south of Drain was formerly the Drain-Yoncalla Highway #236.

item.title: OR-38 East - Drain
item.description: Entering Drain on OR-38 east.

item.title: OR-38 East at OR-138
item.description: OR-38 east at OR-138. Turn right for OR-138 east to Roseburg and Sutherlin. Turn left for OR-38 east to Drain and Eugene.

item.title: OR-38 East Approaching OR-138
item.description: OR-38 East Approaching OR-138 in Elkton. Use OR-138 east for Sutherlin and Roseburg.

item.title: OR-38 East - Dean Creek
item.description: OR-38 east at Dean Creek bridge.

item.title: US-101 North at OR-38 East
item.description: US-101 north at OR-38 to Drain, and Eugene. OR-38 follows the Umpqua River east from Reedsport.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 80
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 80 - Glendale.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 86
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 86 - Quines Creek Road/Barton Road.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 88
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 88 - Azalea/Galesville Reservoir.

item.title: I-5 South - Canyon Creek Summit
item.description: I-5 south at Canyon Creek Summit - Elevation 2020 Feet. Canyon Creek Summit is the highest of the series of passes in the Klamath Mountains between Canyonville and Grants Pass along I-5.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 98
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 98 - Canyonville/Days Creek.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 99
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 99 - North Canyonville/Crater Lake.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 101
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 101 - Riddle/Stanton Park.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 102
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 102 - Gazley Road.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 102
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 102 - Gazley Road.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 103
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 103 - Tri City/Riddle.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 106
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 106 - Tri City/Myrtle Creek.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 106
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 106 - Tri City/Myrtle Creek.

item.title: OR-99 North at I-5 (Exit 109) Onramp
item.description: OR-99 North at I-5 (Exit 109) onramp. Use I-5 north for Roseburg; I-5 south for Grants Pass.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 109 and 103 Route Diagram
item.description: Route Diagram showing OR-99 access to I-5 for Myrtle Creek and Riddle.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 108
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 108 - Myrtle Creek.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 110
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 110 - Boomer Hill Road.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 112
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 112 - Dillard/Winston. OR-99 connects back with I-5 here.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 113
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 113 - Round Prairie/Clarks Branch Road.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 113
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 113 - Round Prairie/Clarks Branch Road.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 119
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 119 - OR-42/OR-99/Coos Bay/Winston.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 119
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 119 - OR-99/OR-42/Winston/Coos Bay.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 120
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 120 - Green District/Roseburg.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 121
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 121 - McLain Ave.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 123
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 123 - Fairgrounds/Umpqua Park.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 123
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 123 - Fairgrounds/Umpqua Park.

item.title: Harvard Ave. East at I-5 and OR-138
item.description: Harvard Ave. East at I-5 and OR-138. Turn right for I-5 south for Fairgrounds and Medford. Straight for I-5 North/OR-138 West to Portland; and straight for OR-138 East to City Center.

item.title: Harvard Ave. East Approaching I-5/OR-138
item.description: Harvard Ave. East approaching I-5/OR-138 in Roseburg.

item.title: OR-138 West at I-5 South
item.description: OR-138 West at I-5 South to Fairgrounds and Medford.

item.title: OR-138 West at I-5 Junction
item.description: OR-138 West at I-5 junction. OR-138 west joins I-5 northbound.

item.title: OR-138 West Approaching I-5
item.description: OR-138 West approaching I-5. Turn right for I-5 north to Portland; use left lane for I-5 south to Medford and Fairgrounds.

item.title: OR-138 West Approaching I-5
item.description: OR-138 West approaching I-5 in Roseburg. Use right lane for I-5 North and OR-138 West. OR-138 west joins I-5 north to Sutherlin.

item.title: OR-138 West at OR-99 South
item.description: OR-138 West (Washington St.) at OR-99 South in Roseburg. Continue straight for OR-138 west to Freeway (I-5) and West Roseburg. Turn left for OR-99 south to City Center and Winston.

item.title: OR-99 North at OR-138
item.description: OR-99 North at OR-138 West (Washington Ave.). Continue straight for OR-99 North/OR-138 East to Diamond Lake and Winchester. Turn left for OR-138 west to Freeway (I-5) and West Roseburg.

item.title: OR-99 South at Oak Ave.
item.description: OR-99 South at Oak Ave. Turn left on Oak Ave. for City Center. Continue south on OR-99 for Winston.

item.title: OR-99 South/OR-138 West at OR-99/OR-138 Split
item.description: OR-99 South/OR-138 West at OR-99/OR-138 Split. Turn right for OR-138 West (Pine St.) to Freeway (I-5) and West Roseburg. Continue south on OR-99 (Stephen St.) for City Center and Winston.

item.title: OR-99 South/OR-138 West Approaching OR-99/OR-138 Split
item.description: OR-99 South/OR-138 West approaching OR-99/OR-138 split. Use left lanes to continue south on OR-99 (Stephens St.)

item.title: OR-138 West/OR-99 South - Use Right Lanes for I-5/OR-138
item.description: OR-138 West/OR-99 South (Stephens St.) in Roseburg. Use right lanes for I-5/OR-138 West.

item.title: OR-138 West Approaching OR-99 In Roseburg
item.description: OR-138 West (Diamond Lake Blvd.) approaching OR-99 (Stephens St.) in Roseburg. Turn left to continue west on OR-138 and for access to I-5 and the Roseburg City Center. OR-138 joins OR-99 for a few blocks into Roseburg.

item.title: Incorrect OR-138 West Shield
item.description: Incorrect OR-138 shield displayed as a US highway marker. Taken between Lemolo Lake and Clearwater Falls.

item.title: Birds Point Road at OR-138
item.description: Birds Point Road at OR-138. Birds Point Road connects the Lemolo Lake area with OR-138. Use OR-138 west to Roseburg; east to Diamond Lake.

item.title: OR-138 West at OR-230
item.description: OR-138 West at OR-230 west to Diamond Lake South Shore and Medford. On the day this photograph was taken a forest fire had closed down OR-230 west, as well as the campgrounds at nearby Diamond Lake. Continue west on OR-138 for Diamond Lake North Shore and Roseburg.

item.title: OR-138 West Approaching OR-230
item.description: OR-138 West approaching OR-230 south to Medford.

item.title: OR-138 west at Crater Lake North Entrance
item.description: OR-138 west at Crater Lake north entrance. Continue right for OR-138 west to Diamond Lake, Medford, and Roseburg.

item.title: US-101 North approaching OR-38
item.description: US-101 north approaching OR-38 to Umpqua Discovery Center and Dean Creek Elk Viewing Area.

item.title: US-101 North approaching OR-38
item.description: US-101 north approaching OR-38 to Drain and Eugene, next right.

item.title: US-101 North at OR-38 East
item.description: US-101 north at OR-38 to City Center, Drain, and Eugene.

item.title: End OR-230 North at OR-138
item.description: Northern end of OR-230 at OR-138 to Roseburg and Bend.
